inapplicable.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

inapplicable.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
inapplicable.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

inapplicable.description: Ensures <blink> elements are not used
inapplicable.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Buttons must have discernible text

inapplicable.description: Ensures <dl> elements are structured correctly

inapplicable.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

inapplicable.help: Table header text must not be empty

inapplicable.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

inapplicable.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

inapplicable.help: Frames should have a unique title attribute

inapplicable.help: Frames must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > form:nth-child(2) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
